greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{d|n, d=5 mod 6} d.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (PARI) for(n=1, 80, print1(sumdiv(n, d, if(Mod(d,6)==5, d, 0)),", ")) \\ _Indranil Ghosh_, Mar 21 2017
def a(n): return sum([d for d in divisors(n) if d%6==5]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Mar 21 2017
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Mar 20 2017
